# Mastery Self-Report Gate

## Instructions for Submission

To complete this assessment, you will need to:

1. Take a screenshot of your civic competencies dashboard showing your current progress
2. Write a 100-word reflection addressing:
   - Key areas of growth in your civic competencies
   - Specific feedback you've implemented
   - How this feedback has improved your understanding

## Submission Rubric

| Criteria | Points | Description |
|----------|--------|-------------|
| Dashboard Screenshot | 5 | Clear, complete image of your dashboard |
| Reflection Completeness | 5 | Addresses all required elements within word count |
| Depth of Insight | 10 | Demonstrates thoughtful analysis of feedback implementation |
| Application Evidence | 5 | Shows concrete examples of how feedback was applied |

This gate ensures you've not only received feedback but have meaningfully applied it to develop your civic competencies before proceeding.
